name: astral
description: The realm of EC2 Auto-scaling and Provisioning

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run eslint && ASTRAL_ROOT="$(pwd)/lib/" NODE_ENV=test lab -v -c -a code test
scripts.init-db: createuser -s -d astral; createdb astral; createdb astral-test
scripts.migrate: npm run migrate-dev && npm run migrate-test
scripts.rollback: npm run rollback-dev && npm run rollback-test
scripts.queues: while true; do OP=$(rabbitmqctl list_queues); OP=$(node -e "var l = process.argv[1].split('\n'); l.shift(); console.log(l.map(function(s) { var m=s.split(/\s+/); return m[1] + '   ' + m[0]; }).join('\n'));" "$OP"); clear; echo "$OP"; sleep 0.5; done;
scripts.shiva-test: npm run shiva-lint && npm run shiva-eslint && ASTRAL_ROOT="$(pwd)/lib/" NODE_ENV=test lab -m 1000 -v -c -a code test/shiva/unit test/shiva/functional
scripts.shiva-integration-server: ASTRAL_ROOT="$(pwd)/lib/" LOG_LEVEL=trace NODE_ENV=test lab -a code -v -m 300000 integration/shiva/server.js | bunyan

author: Ryan Sandor Richards <ryan@runnable.com> (http://www.runnable.com)
